tweets.text:
Appearing before the Public Accounts Committee on 14th Jan 2021 Sir James Bevan CEO of the @EnvAgency said "Almost by definition, we are not allowing people to discharge sewage into chalk streams".

Let's just check that statement shall we. https://t.co/tAAPJW9Wge
@bradfordmdc @JudithCummins @Bradford_TandA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyYNE I know. That's the point! The local officer Jon is fully aware of the address, but no action is ever taken

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

tweets.text: @RiverChess @thameswater have turned the River Chess from a rare chalkstream into a cheap extension of their sewerage network. What is the @EnvAgency doing to prevent this destruction of a precious natural resource?

tweets.text: I'm very happy to let you all know that from April I will be going the @EnvAgency as a Senior Hydrologist in the Flood Hydrology Improvement team! #TeamEA https://t.co/GvqMKB0Vt2

tweets.text: It’s that simple @EnvAgency https://t.co/ngXHA3MLDm
@Feargal_Sharkey @JamesBevanEA @RiverChess @thameswater I thought chalk streams were rare and protected? Is nothing sacred anymore?
@ShefEnvironment totally orange stream this morning https://t.co/2Y2LxmJexU
@Cambs_Traffic @CambsCC @EnvAgency Hi, can we have an update on this please? Absolutely no flooding on the road, bridge still closed, levels low and clearly risk is no longer present...

@SuperSkylord @EnvAgency I'm happy to leave it to the Public Accounts Committee to decide on how to take it forward. 

At the least. He further damages his own and the Agency's credibility, not that there was much of either left.
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Can’t you sue him? ✅

If the the @EnvAgency CEO @JamesBevanEA is not aware that sewage is discharged into chalk streams what chance have we got. The @RiverChess has had 79 sewage discharges over a 16 month period between 24 Sept 2019 and 25th Jan 2021.

Unloading after over a week on the road battling the rain and snow. @SonTekYSI M9 & @ARCboat have collected some record data that helped issue @EnvAgencyMids flood warnings & will improve @FloodForecasts for next time #teamEA @DefraGovUK https://t.co/jG3ltcSCfZ

@hortijames @EnvAgency No matter how good a farmer you are soil is soluble in water I would guess that soil still leaves the field at a certain level under the best notill cover crop systems But. I bet they build more than leaves each year

From this drone pic, you really get a sense of the huge volume of floodwater we’re dealing with at #Malton, thanks to everyone involved in the major pumping still ongoing to keep everyone safe @EnvAgencyYNE @NorthYorksFire @northyorkscc @RyedaleDC https://t.co/IfK1wLilUU

We responded to @DefraGovUK Regulatory Review of the 8 Farming Rules for Water 👇

"Given the climate, water, air, soil and biodiversity crisis, regulations must now go beyond halting
degradation and look to restore and regenerate."

Read our recs: https://t.co/rXIoGMXBgk

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency So the options are: He didn’t know, in which case he should resign as clearly not up to the job. Or he did know in which case he lied, and should also resign. How is this allowed?
